as you did not abandon your nation at Badr…

text: Bu kutlu dava için canlarından vazgeçenlerin…

english: We entrust to you the lives of those who gave their lives for this sacred cause.

text: Muhakkak ki sen emanetleri en iyi muhafaza edensin.
english: Surely You are the best guardian of trusts.
In the name of our noble Prophet… …O

text: …dualarımızı dergâh-ı izzetinde kabul eyle ya Rabbim.
english: Lord, accept our prayers in Your exalted presence.
I will crush you like a little chick.
Carry only what you can carry! Burn what you can't carry !
traitorous Alp has returned to the camp.
-Where is that dog? He went to his tent. We
will keep a close eye on him. They will decide what will happen when

text: Ertuğrul Bey ve Aliyar Bey geldiğinde ne olacağına karar verecekler.
english: Ertuğrul Bey and Aliyar Bey arrive . I'll
The woman mixed up the order of the motifs, mother.
You're right, my daughter. Well done

text: Hatun, üçlü sıralarda düğüm atasın. Kurtayağını da kaçırmayasın.
english: Lady, tie the knots in the rows of three. Don't miss the wolf's paw either.
Okay, Mother Hayme. Here you go

text: Halime Hatun, Hayme Ana'ya motif mi götürürsün?
english: Halime Hatun, are you taking motifs to Hayme Ana? Yeah.

text: Sen zahmet etmeyesin. Ver ben götüreyim.
english: Give it to me, I'll take it. There's

text: Size de yardım etmek isterim. Maksat işler hızlansın.
english: I'd like to help you too. The aim is to speed things up.

text: İşler hızlıdır, Günyeli Hatun. Sen merak etmeyesin.
english: Things move quickly, Günyeli Hatun. Do n't worry.

text: Senin de iznin olursa gül göbeği dokuyalım diyoruz.
english: your permission, we'd like to try weaving a rose petal pattern.
We weave these into the edges.
But… wouldn’t it be more meaningful if we embroidered

text: …ana, motifin etrafına diken nakşetsek daha manalı olmaz mı?

english: Can there be a rose without thorns? Of course not

text: Lakin bu gülün dikenleri gizlidir, Günyeli Hatun.
english: But this rose has hidden thorns, Günyeli Hatun. It
who want to see, will see.
That's why I didn't put thorns in my motif.
(Sound of breathing through the nose) Don't you
dare tell me you've lost the ammunition.

text: Suçu olan biri varsa o da bu haberi Ertuğrul'a uçuran haindir.
english: If anyone is guilty, it's the traitor who tipped off Ertuğrul about this.

text: O haini bulup ellerimle öldüreceğim, ellerimle.
english: that traitor and kill him with my own hands, with my own hands.
Look at the one closest to you. Keep a close
eye on those closest to you.

text: Aksi takdirde Ertuğrul daha çok zafer kazanır.
english: Otherwise, Ertuğrul will win even more victories.
(All together) May Allah glorify your victory!

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Allah zaferinizi yüceltsin! Hoş geldiniz.
english: (All together) May Allah glorify your victory ! Welcome.
(All together) May Allah glorify your victory!

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Allah razı olsun sizden!

english: Oh! Thank God my brave boy is back.
God keep them on the same path.
(All together) May Allah glorify your victory!

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Hoş geldiniz yiğitler! Hoş geldiniz.
Hoş geldiniz oğul. Gazanız mübarek olsun.
english: Welcome, son. May your campaign be blessed. It's

text: Hoş gördük ana. Allah razı olsun.
english: great to see you, Mom. May God bless you.

text: Hoş geldin abi. Fethiniz mübarek olsun.
english: Welcome, brother. May your victory be blessed. It's good to be here,

text: Hoş bulduk bacım. Allah razı olsun.
Beyim, verdiğiniz vazife çok şükür tamam oldu.
english: Sir, thank God, the task you assigned has been completed.
I found out who we were looking for.
tribe's brave young men, valiant warriors...
their wives and husbands. Thank God… the
infidels have been defeated once again. The ammunition
they gathered to shed our blood …
…has become the spoils of our war.
(All at once) Thank God, sir! May

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Allah razı olsun sizden!
(Hep bir ağızdan) Şükürler olsun! Şükürler olsun beyim!
english: (All together) Thank God! Thank goodness, sir!

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Zaferiniz mübarek olsun beyim!
english: (All together) Congratulations on your victory, sir!
(All together) Long live our lord! Will cruel arrows pierce

text: İman dolu göğsümüzü zalim oklar mı delecek?
english: our hearts full of faith ? Will treacherous traps obstruct
the path that God has opened for His victorious servants
the world that trembles at the footsteps of the Turk
We have sworn to uphold the divine order… to rescue the oppressed suffering
at the hands of the oppressor

text: …ve Allah'ın adaletini cihanın dört bucağına yaymaya ant içtik.
english: … and to spread God's justice throughout the world . A

text: Türk ant içerse sözünü tutmadan ölmez.
english: Turk, once he swears an oath, will not die without keeping his word.

text: Türk gözünü düşmana dikmişse zaferi görmeden ölmez.
english: If a Turk has his eyes fixed on the enemy, he will not die before seeing victory.

text: Atamız Alpaslan pes etmedi. Biz de pes etmeyeceğiz.
english: Our ancestor Alpaslan did not give up. We will not give up either.

text: O, kılıcıyla doğudan batıya bir yol açtı.
english: He forged a path from east to west with his sword .

text: Bu yol bizim istikbalimizdir. Ucu bucağı, nihayeti yoktur.
english: This path is our future. It has no end , no limit.

text: Nefesimiz yettiğince biz de o yoldan yürüyeceğiz.
english: We will continue to walk that path for as long as we have the breath to do so. We will

text: İlahi nizamı koruyup adaleti cihanın dört bir yerine yayacağız.
english: uphold divine order and spread justice throughout the world. To those who

text: Gücünüz yetmez diyenlere, inancımız yeter diyeceğiz.
english: say we don't have the power, we will say our faith is enough. To those

text: Aklınız yetmez diyenlere, mücadelemiz yeter diyeceğiz.
english: who say we lack the intelligence, we will say our struggle is enough. To

text: Ömrünüz yetmez diyenlere, tarihimiz yeter diyeceğiz.
english: those who say, "Your lifespan won't be long enough," we will say, "Our history will suffice." To
those who say, "The world will not be yours," we
will say, "Allah is sufficient for us."

english: Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Aliyar Bey!
